<template>
  <el-tabs v-model="activeName" @tab-click="handleClick">
    <el-tab-pane label="用户管理" name="first">我的课程</el-tab-pane>
    <el-tab-pane label="配置管理" name="second">我的任务</el-tab-pane>
  </el-tabs>
</template>

<script>
  import { ref } from 'vue'
  export default {
    setup() {
      const activeName = ref('second')
      const handleClick = (tab, event) => {
        console.log(tab, event)
      }
      return { activeName, handleClick }
    }
  }
</script>

<style scoped>
.el-tabs__header {
    height: 60px;
    /* box-shadow: 0px -1px 0px 0px #f2f2f2 inset;
    padding: 0 30px;
    font-size: 0;
    font-weight: 500;

    cursor: pointer;
    display: inline-block;
    margin-right: 30px;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 60px;
    font-size: 16px; */
    padding: 0px 24px;
}
